articles.title: About me
articles.contents:
Hi!
I am a student at the University of Toronto. I’m in the Data Science Specialist Program, and I like studying statistics.
Recently, I gave a workshop on web scraping and APIs. You can look at my past projects in the projects page. Some notable courses I’ve taken are CSC148(Intro to programming) and STA130(Intro to stats). I also learned to use many python libraries such as pandas and matplotlib in my spare time, and am used to writing scripts that help me collect and process data.
I believe that having fun is the first step to success. All of my projects are inspired by some of my personal problems, and I enjoy improving parts of my life using code.
In my spare time, I work on digital art, I go to the gym, and I watch anime.
(this is supposed to show that I am a human outside of whatever I do in University, I’m trying to show that I actually mean what I say and I’m not just writing some stuff down to satisfy a recruiter or something like that)

            Bio
            I’m Kevin Wang!
            I study data science at the University of Toronto. I draw and code in my spare time.
            My goal is to have fun, and create real-world impact through programming. This is why every project I make solves some sort of problem in my life.
            
            
            Experience
            ISSC | Web Scraping and APIs workshop | July 2021
            STEM Fellowship | Google Analytics Team | September 2019 - October 2020
            
            
            Projects
            Edworthy Web Scraping Project
            Uses discord and web scraping to notify me when my favorite locations are empty. Uses BeautifulSoup and discord.py in python.
            
            
            
            Education
            University of Toronto | Toronto, ON GPA 3.93/4.00
            Data Science Specialist | September 2020 - May 2024

articles.title: Projects
articles.description: Selected projects in R and python.
articles.contents:
Contents
Edworthy web scraping project
House prices linear regression project
League of Legends Project

Edworthy web scraping project
A bot that looks at google search results and tells me when parks are empty, so that I can go on walks. Uses BeautifulSoup and discord.py in python.

Google results(left) gets translated to a Bot notification(right)
github repository
House prices linear regression project
Predicting house prices in Ames, Iowa. This was a challenge on Kaggle that I did. I mostly followed the tutorials there to get the hang of linear regression in python.
github repository
League of Legends Project
Used the Riot Games API to scrape data for League of Legends(Video Game) matches. Hopes to find insights.
Coming Soon.
